mapper.sql: main_id, main_title, main_creat, main_isuse, main_endtime, main_creatuser, main_creatdep
mapper.select:
select
from questionnaire_main
main_id LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{mainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and main_title LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{mainTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and main_creat LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{mainCreat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and main_endtime >= NOW()
and main_isuse = 'y'
and #{mainCreat,jdbcType=DATE} >= main_creat
and #{mainOverTime,jdbcType=DATE} <= main_creat
and main_creatuser = #{mainCreatuser,jdbcType=DATE}
order by main_creat desc limit #{page,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{row,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(main_id) from questionnaire_main
main_id LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{mainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and main_title LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{mainTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and main_creat LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{mainCreat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and main_endtime >= NOW()
and main_isuse = 'y'
and #{mainCreat,jdbcType=DATE} >= main_creat
and #{mainOverTime,jdbcType=DATE} <= main_creat
and main_creatuser = #{mainCreatuser,jdbcType=DATE}
mapper.insert: insert into questionnaire_main (main_id, main_title, main_creat, main_isuse, main_endtime, main_creatuser, main_creatdep) values (#{mainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainCreat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mainIsuse,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mainEndtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{mainCreatuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainCreatdep,jdbcType=INTEGER})

main_id,

mapper.update:
update questionnaire_main
main_title = #{mainTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
main_creat = #{mainCreat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
main_isuse = #{mainIsuse,jdbcType=CHAR},
main_endtime = #{mainEndtime,jdbcType=DATE},
main_creatuser = #{mainCreatuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
main_creatdep = #{mainCreatdep,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where main_id = #{mainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
